channel.title: Comments on: Family-Integrated Church 17: Samuel, Jesus, and Paul (Part 1)

item.title: By: Shawn Mathis
item.dc:creator: Shawn Mathis
item.description:
Greetings Mr. Waldron,
I am pleased that someone else is reviewing this growing movement. I have studied it for over 2 years and think we can compliment each others approach.
I do not wish to "highjack" your blog, but if you are willing I can give links to the following but people can google:
1. What Doug Phillips believes "Christian homeschooling conference: who is Doug Phillips?" (examiner.com) 2. "A Weed in the Church: a Review" (ChristianNurture.blogspot.com) 3. "What is a Family Integrated Church?" (weswhite.net) 4. "Uniting Church and Family" (weswhite.net)
thank you, Pastor Shawn Mathis
item.content:encoded:
Greetings Mr. Waldron,

I am pleased that someone else is reviewing this growing movement. I have studied it for over 2 years and think we can compliment each others approach.

I do not wish to “highjack” your blog, but if you are willing I can give links to the following but people can google:

1. What Doug Phillips believes “Christian homeschooling
conference: who is Doug Phillips?” (examiner.com)
2. “A Weed in the Church: a Review” (ChristianNurture.blogspot.com)
3. “What is a Family Integrated Church?” (weswhite.net)
4. “Uniting Church and Family” (weswhite.net)

thank you,
Pastor Shawn Mathis
